ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build multi-analyzers which increase research speed and allow higher-level research projects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vitals monitor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build vitals monitors which improve medical outcomes when placed next to hospital beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build fabrication benches, capable of high-tech projects ranging from component assembly to power armor construction.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the technology to build a fabrication bench - but it also requires some advanced components to get started. You can collect advanced components several ways:

 -All outlander settlements sell advanced components. Send a caravan to buy some.
 -Some visiting traders sell advanced components. Invite or wait for them.
 -Some quests are rewarded with advanced components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fabricate advanced components from standard components and other materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of indefinite suspended animation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: recon armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft recon armor, a light powered armor suit used by scout troops who need protection on the move. Note that these also require advanced components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: marine armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build marine armor, a general-use powered armor suit used by high-tech shock troops. Note that these also require advanced components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pulse-charged munitions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build weapons which fire pulse-charged munitions for extra damage. Note that these also require advanced components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionic replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: uranium slug turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor-penetrating uranium slug turret. It fires uranium slugs which tear through plasteel like paper, but it's less effective at close range.
